Four Investigations

Each project maps a different territory where language models meet the resistance of the real world.

Receipt Classification & Matching System

Automated statement-to-receipt reconciliation for faster, cleaner tax submission workflows.

  • Document AI
  • Expense Operations
  • Classification
  • Reduced manual receipt matching and exception triage effort.
  • Improved categorization consistency for tax-ready reporting.
  • Added ambiguity handling for difficult vendor names.
Open full case study

Japanese Tax Expert System (JTES) – Specialized RAG for Professionals

AI-powered Japanese tax analysis built on official NTA and e-Gov sources, with verifiable citations for every answer.

  • Japanese Tax Law
  • Citation-Backed AI
  • Official Data Sources
  • Professional Workflow
  • Trusted answers for Japanese tax law based on official government data.
  • {"Four integrated solutions"=>"Tax AI Advisor, Regulatory Monitoring, Legal Research and Comparison, and Multi-Tenant Platform."}
  • Citation-first response design focused on verifiability over AI guesswork.
Open full case study

Bilingual Ceremony Script Generator (NotebookLM Collaboration)

Produced grounded Japanese/English ceremony scripts with strong style control and iterative refinement.

  • Grounded Generation
  • Human-in-the-Loop
  • Style Control
  • Used 10 prior scripts as grounding corpus for consistent quality.
  • Generated theme-faithful bilingual output for an Ancient Grecian concept.
  • Reduced rewriting time with collaborative iteration cycles.
Open full case study

Enterprise AI Enablement in Insurance – Reporting & Incident Intelligence

Automated reporting and incident intelligence to improve executive visibility and decision making.

  • Enterprise Automation
  • Incident Intelligence
  • Executive Reporting
  • Automated PM reporting and executive dashboard workflows.
  • Unified insights across Confluence, Jira, SharePoint, Power Automate, and Power BI.
  • Added coding-agent parsers for hundreds of MB of incident data trend analysis.
